midway.translation[0].definitions[0].def: between two places, and the same distance from each of them
midway.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The city is midway between Edinburgh and London.
midway.translation[0].definitions[1].def: when half a period of time has passed
midway.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Leeds scored midway through the first half.
midway.translation[1].definitions[0].def: two small islands in the Pacific Ocean northwest of Honolulu, used as a US military base. There was an important sea and air battle there in 1942 called the Battle of Midway.
midway.translation[2].definitions[0].def: an airport in Chicago, Illinois, used mostly for flights within the US
